summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to, and providing for, the disposition of certain monies seized and forfeited, and the disposition of proceeds from the sale of goods and materials seized and forfeited, pursuant to the Uniform Controlled Substances Act; accepting such forfeitures and appropriating such monies to reimburse expenses incurred by the Police and Law Departments to expand Police and Law Department programs that enforce controlled substance and other drug enforcement laws; transferring to the State its required share of the value of such forfeitures; and increasing the 2004 Budgets of the Police and Law Departments; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
